General.Name: CastleNet Technology
General.Description: CastleNet Technology Inc. develops, manufactures, and sells consumer electronics products. The company provides broadband communication products, such as data modems, data gateways, EMTA gateways, ECMM products, and WiFi mesh systems; and digital home entertainment products. It operates in Asia, the United States, and Europe. The company was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan. CastleNet Technology Inc. is a subsidiary of Kinpo Electronics, Inc.
General.Address: No.159-1, Beishen Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan
